name: Slide Picture Puzzle - Unity Complete Project
name_original: Slide Picture Puzzle - Unity Complete Project
description:
Slide Picture Puzzle is a new type of classic puzzle game .This game helps you reduce time to build a similar game easy. You do not need to know any programming language to configure and use it. It is very easy to fill it with your own tasks, make UI changes,change your Admod, Unity, IronSource ID start to gain experience in promoting your game and earning money. We will support you until you feel the most satisfaction for this asset.

DOWNLOAD DEMO APK FILE

Requirements :
  • Unity free license version 2020 or later
  • MacOS and Xcode for build iOS
Game Features:
  • This is a completed game designer, sound, effects, gameplay,full resource, full animation, for such a full sound
  • Amazing system level: Comes with 8 Package with over 280 unique puzzle image included that you can use as a starting point for your own game.
  • Easy Reskin: Easy-to-use to change the picture of your game without knowing how to program. (video guide)
  • Levels Locking: : Package can be locked and can be unlocked by the player by either spending Gems, Star.
  • Ads Monetization : Admob, Unity Ads, IronSource Ads integrated (Banner, Interstitial, Video Reward)
  • Rewarded Ads (get free gems)
  • GDPR support
  • Push notification with Onesignal
  • Hint Systems: Players can spend gems to use the highlight pictures on the board
  • Sounds: Background music and sound effects are included with a settings to mute sounds in the game
  • Multiple screen sizing for most mobile devices
  • Professional and clean code, clean projects
  • Simple and attractive
  • Easy reskin for all platform.
  • New Developer friendly
  • Support multi-platform: Android, iOS, Web Player
  • Support for Unity 2020 or higher
  • Support build 64Bit, API Latest, Android 12
  • Support build Android App Bundle (AAB)
  • Documents update online,video guide,visual tutorial, Support 24/7
This pack includes :
  • Full game ready to publish, easy reskined
  • Clear documentation, video guide, demo apk
